translations: 不停的，不懈的，持续不断的

sentences.sentence: He watched her with unremitting attention.
I was sent to boarding school, where I spent six years of unremitting misery.
sentences.translation: 我被送到寄宿学校去，在那里度过了无尽痛苦的六年。

sentences.sentence: Tuesday was a day of similar unremitting toil.
sentences.translation: 星期二是同样的连续不断的苦工。
